name: GameFAQs - Monospace Font Size Addon - Small
description: A simple style addon that makes base font size smaller allowing to see more text lines per browser view. Designed especially for those reading one or several instances of FAQs/walkthroughs while playing. Can be used in combination with any other style for GameFAQs.
additional_info: This a Small version: 85% (the smallest readable) of original font size, Courier New.
